page.title: 09The Kingswood Police
page.content: { Staple Hill Police Station}is the HQ of the{Avon and Somerset Police}'D' Division which covers Kingswood and Northavon.The station itself is the base for the police who work in Staple Hill,Mangotsfield,Downend,Soundwell and parts of Kingswood and Siston Approximately 100 police are based there and this includes 12 policewomen There are four shifts of 15 men whose duties are either in the station,in {cars}or as{Community Policemen}.The role of the Community Policeman is to know well his area and the people who live there.He has a free hand to visit schools and Old Age Pensioners' Homes to build up a good relationship between the law and the local people. The most common crimes are{thefts from {cars}and{burglary.}The station receives an average 40-50 calls for assistance every day.
